argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gxinv.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | gxinv.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gxinv.3 | |- P = ( ^g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_gxinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( N ` A ) e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) P K ) = ( N ` ( ( N ` A ) P K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syld3an2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) P K ) = ( N ` ( ( N ` A ) P K ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_grpo2inv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) = A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( N ` ( N ` A ) ) P K ) = ( A P K ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( N ` ( ( N ` A ) P K ) ) = ( A P K ) ) |
